text: Gro Ystwyth is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion, west Wales. It encompasses the Grogwynion Special Area of Conservation (SAC). ==See also== *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion ==External links== *Core Management Plan for Grogwynion SAC Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion
title: Gro Ystwyth
